"A.D.2028/3/22/17:00":
"...I see, what a relief.
Everything's alright now."

"I don't know what's going on but...
You saved both of us.
Thanks...so..."

"Both of their vitals are stable now.
There's nothing to worry anymore."
"What we're worried about now was that mysterious monster. It's different from a Darker, but what it is exactly..."

"Rehabilitation was the initial goal,
but you handled that well regardless,
despite a surprise transfer to a foreign place!"

"We can't take any further action right now,
so please return with haste."

"Well, I'll be! I was right! All of that crazy stuff was just in my dreams!
I'm relieved, I'm sooo relieved! Hah!-"
